Ps 18:12 (= 2Sa 22:12 v. supr.), so [[רַָעַם]] ´[[ס]] Ps 81:8 hiding-place of thunder; of adulterer [[פָּנִים]] ´[[ס]] [[יׇשִׂים]] Job 24:15 i.e. disguiseth himself.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: secret place, of womb Ps 139:15 (‖[[תַּחְתִּיּוֹת אָָרֶץ]]).

secrecy: ´[[דְּבַר־ס]] Ju Jdg 3:19 a matter of secrecy, secret matter; pl. abstr. intens. [[לֶחֶם סְתָרִים]] Pr 9:17 bread of utter secrecy (i.e. gained stealthily, ‖[[מַיִם גְּנוּבִים]]); [[לְשׁׂן סָָתֶר]] Pr 25:23 tongue of secrecy, i.e. slanderous; elsewhere ´[[בַּסּ]] in secrecy, secretly De 13:7, De 27:15, De 27:24, De 28:57, 2Sa 12:12, Je 37:17, Je 38:16, Je 40:15, Is 45:19, Is 48:16, Job 13:10, Job 31:27, Pr 21:14, Ps 101:5.
